attributes.action: The Home Secretary should resign for her treatment of the WIndrush generation.
attributes.background: The Windrush generation were invited to Britain, to all intents and purposes they were and remain British. To call their right to be in the UK into question is insulting in the extreme.

rejection.details: The resignation of a Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
